&#9758 Collections made in the Counties of Lawrence, Boyd, Carter, Johnson, Pike, and Floyd, Ky. and Wayne County, Va.
Law and Collection Office of K. F. Prichard.
Louisville, Ky. 26 March 1864

To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Govern Ky
Dr Sir-

Enclosed I send you Petition in my favor stating my condition & praying you to remit a fine against me in the Laurel Circuit Court As is stated in the Petition I am poor & confined to my bed with loss of Eyesight & can do nothing I do hope you will be merciful to me as it is my first offence
